website_summaries.verdict: For anyone looking to naturally tighten the appearance of skin in a relaxing manner, this massage oil is a no-brainer.
pros: Begins to reduce the appearance of cellulite with only a few uses
cons: Scent is stronger than that of other oils

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil definitely helped me get rid of alot of the cellulite in my belly area. Im so buying this again once my bottle is done 👍 I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Stay dedicated
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 5 weeks now. I use a massage tool on my arms for about 3-5 min each in the shower with the anti cellulite massage oil. I feel like I am seeing a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Katorade

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This company is great. This product didn't do all that I wanted it to but it did leave a beautiful glow on my skin and I think if I use it longer maybe I will see some results. The company contacted me personally and apologized that I didn't receive the results that I wanted and they gave me a full refund and another product to try. This company really cares about its customers which goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: TBlessed

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing find!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using any product for cellulite, i used it after my shower with a scala massager and the results are amazing just 1 time use! I can’t wait to see the result after a few weeks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product every day in the shower for 6 months. It has significantly reduced the cellulite on my thighs. I highly recommend it!!!! Great customer service too!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Reduces cellulite fast and firms loose skin
customer_reviews.text: Started working in 4 days. Reduced cellulite and firmed up saggy skin from weight loss. Skin looks rejuvinated and young. My sister is buying some now. Cons are that the amazing effects reverse back if you quit using the product within 2 months and the smell is not fabulous (use a wonderful smelling lotion after). Highly recommend; it's wonderful. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Effervescence

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye cellulite
customer_reviews.text: It helps remove cellulite, need I say more? This stuff actually works guys!! My skin feels tight in all the right places. I use this product every night. Its such a great price and I am such a skeptic but this one changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: fmugs71

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not seeing a difference. I've been using this since it was delivered...gave it 3 weeks before I wrote my review. I followed the directions down to the letter and am disappointed. Will not order again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Does not work AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: This does NOTGHING , wondering if most of these reviews are getting a free bottle to leave a positive review , I’m not sugar coating nothing ! It absolutely does nothing to cellulite at all so don’t waist your money peeps ! Also they cranked the price way up too
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Cottage Cheese Thighs
customer_reviews.text: Truly loving this oil! I've had a beach trip planned for quite some time and decided to up my game and try out some different ways to decrease cellulite (hello, in a swimsuit around all my friends!). I must say, it works and I can honestly say I've noticed a dramatic difference. My routine: dry brush in a circular motion, take a shower with coffee scrubb, then apply oil with lotion after. I bought all items under the suggested "buy these items for __" --- totally worth the try and I will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis S.

customer_reviews.title: New purchase - happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: This product came greatly packaged, with several caps and two pumps for one bottle, which is excellent if you plan on using it both at home, and/or while traveling. It smells spa citrusy, very good and subtle, unlike some other similar products on the market that have a very strong, almost chemical citrusy smell. The oil goes on smoothly, it’s not too thick and absorbs quickly, I cannot say much about the results just yet, but I will update this review once I’m using it this product for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha718

customer_reviews.title: Along with using a fascia blaster this is really helping ...
customer_reviews.text: Along with using a fascia blaster this is really helping to firm up the skin on my tummy after having 3 kids. I have been using it for a week and see a higher difference already.
customer_reviews.author: LoloMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this product because it had great reviews. I am a small person and only ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product because it had great reviews. I am a small person and only had a small area on my legs where I can't seem to get rid of the cellulite even through diet and exercise. Only been using the product a week hadn't noticed much improvement yet on my legs. May be too soon I'm not sure. Did however apply it to my face and it has really made a great improvement on my face. My face is typically very dry and NOTHING soothes it. Except for this product. My face is smooth and looks and feels amazing. I had a couple of breakouts on my face and this product cleared it up within just two days.
customer_reviews.author: Madisonsmom81

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I can definitely see a difference on my thighs and butt. I have only used it for a week so I can't wait to see the results after 30 days! I will definetly be purchasing more. Black women this is an awesome product Sometimes we may not think things are made for US but this really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this for after shower- the scent is very invigorating with all the citrus noted. Pre-shower I use a dry brush and then after shower I apply this oil. My skin feels great and glowy. Not sure if it helps with cellulite but I didn't put too much faith in that claim in the first place. The mere act of massaging the skin and increasing blood flow is the biggest benefit in fighting cellulite by what I've heard. The bottle is good size and comes with multiple dispenser caps: pump, snap open, and unscrew lids.
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully, smells nice and results are permanent!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to say this stuff WORKS.... I have stretch marks from losing weight, gaining, losing, gaining, band on and on and on... Well, I've started losing again (let's hope this time is IT!) and I started using this back in January and I've noticed significant improvement in the texture and appearance of my skin. And what's best is....it seems the results are permanent. Not like that over-priced Nerium junk you have to carry around and use non-stop while your bank account evaporates. Anyway, I really like the citrus smell, the fast absorbancy and the results! Glad I bought 2!!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after looking at the many before and after pictures in the reviews. I’ve been using it on almost a daily basis for about the last 2 months. I can tell a tad bit of a difference in my “saddle bag” area but absolutely no difference in my stomach area as others have posted they did. I am a runner and run approximately 3-5 miles at least 3-4 days a week and do other exercises as well on the other days. It’s not like I’m just wanting a magic cream and not doing the work. I just haven’t seen the results that others have.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I have had cellulite and stretch marks ever since I was a teenager. I sometimes run but have never taken it seriously and has always maintained 115-120 pounds in weight. With this oil I have seen a drastic change in my butt and thigh area. My stretch marks are slowly but consistently disappearing and my cellulite are also disappearing. Will definitely continue to purchase this item for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jissel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Massage to see results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for for my upper leg back and I was using it for a week without massage just applying it and I have to admit I didn't see any difference but by the second week I decided to use the cup massage and even though it's a bit painful to use those cups I have noticed big difference by massaging it.
customer_reviews.author: needit

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 3 weeks and I have noticed results. I have lost 3 inches off my thighs and 2 on my waistline. I have lost 6 pounds . When i use this i apply after showers and befor bed. Make sure you take time and really work the oil into you skin. Hope this product works just as well for everyone else as it has for me😄
customer_reviews.author: Rose1

customer_reviews.title: it is not greasy and leaves my skin feeling good. I am having a problem with the scent
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a week and using it after showering : it is not greasy and leaves my skin feeling good. I am having a problem with the scent... it smells to me like lemon pine sol. I am not ready to abandon it because the scent dissipates pretty quickly and I think I can live with it. I don't think there is any product that will remove cellulite, just diet, exercise and less drinks at night.
customer_reviews.author: kim m

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: The oil does penetrate my skin after a shower and give me a smooth finish that lasts all day long. The only thing that needs some adjusting is the smell. The eucalyptus dominates but it makes me feel very zen and tranquil. Might do the same for you too!
customer_reviews.author: Omega

customer_reviews.title: I used this with a cellulite brush. Results took ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this with a cellulite brush. Results took 6 weeks, but so worth it! Be patient! I used it everyday for about 4 weeks, now I use it every other day. Just finished my first bottle, it lasted me 3 months. Use right after your shower. I always brushed it in while still standing in the shower because I am messy. My husband didn't know I was using this product, but the other day I was wearing spandex shorts and he asked if I had been going to the gym when he was sleeping - nope! Magic in a bottle, but you have to be patient. I almost stopped using it around week 4.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Massage Oil
customer_reviews.text: Imagine a cozy pamper night filled with a lovely warm bath followed by anti cellulite treatment massage oil to lather you up and get you all moisturized. You get that with this product. It smells great and it works well. Obviously it wont remove all your cellulite but guess what it has a luxurious feel to it and you dont feel yucky and slimy afterwards. Happy with this oil and the ingredients in it. You get a decent amount for the bottle price and it will last you a while if used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Yakov Abdurakhmanov

customer_reviews.title: The cons outweigh the pros... for me.
customer_reviews.text: The Pros: This product smells great (it has a citrus smell of oranges) and leaves your skin new born baby smooth, with a healthy glow. The cons: it’s pricy, it does not appear to do anything for cellulite as advertised and it takes a really long time to absorb into the skin. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Surprise benefit: Mosquito repellant!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought it because I had to know why so many were raving about the scent, and the scent is perfectly lemony. Was hopeful it would help smooth out some of the cellulite, it didn’t, but I wasn’t expecting a miracle anyway. However, I’m giving it a 5 star rating because it surprisingly kept the mosquitos away! Yeah! Who knew?!? 4 stars for the moisturizing and the scent; left me feeling silky; it’s an oil that doesn’t feel oily. 2 stars for cellulite: it does smooth Dry skin and seemed to plump up the surface lessening the appearance of uneven skin
customer_reviews.author: Latin McFly

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE I have been using this oil for around 6 weeks and I don’t think it has help with the cellulite BUT my husband said that it makes my skin so smooth that I should order it again so I just ordered a second bottle. It smells great and is a great moisturizer which is why I would still give it 4 stars. ————— I still don’t know if it works because I started using it yesterday so in few weeks I will update my review. I love the essence of this oil and I love how the seller provides 2 different pumps and 2 different lids, extremely versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Urena

customer_reviews.title: The smell is something you’d have to get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell is something you’d have to get used to...bottle is almost empty don’t see any changes n I exercise..5’3 143 lbs...so should not be that hard to do it’s magux as it claims...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product, it works if you use daily!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Finally, one that works! I see a difference after just 4 days of using this product. I use this each day, mornimg and night. I like the smell. It keeps my skin soft. I see the scars and cellulite fading away. I feel much younger already. I tried this on my face as part of my face cleaning regimen. It did not leave my face greasy and helps my face look younger. I will buy another bottle soon! I'm hoping with the right diet, etc things will be back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Heaven In A Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I can already see the celulite leaving my thighs and it's only been a week. The scent is so smooth and when you put it on (after your shower) it soaks into your skin so easily. I used a cellulite massage tool to make sure that it was absorbed as much as possible, but I'm pretty sure it would still be awesome without that tool. It's not messy, no stick residue, and It doesn't leave you super oily like you're about to go fry yourself. I'll be getting another bottle in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Deberry

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great! Smooth skin!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works and smells amazing. It has an orange peel / citrus smell that is pleasant and not overpowering. It leaves your skin feeling silky smooth and really works. It tightens the skin and does help break down cellulite. That being said, I use this with a fascia blaster as well. When used with other oils, it did not work as well as this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Crystle Zamagni

customer_reviews.title: Take a chance!! AMAZING PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: Being that I lost a lot of weight, my legs are definitely showing a lot more cellulite and stretch marks. Been using this product for about two weeks now and I can honestly say I already see a dramatic change in my thighs, arms and stomach. Strongly recommend this to anyone that wants to get rid of stretch marks and tighten their skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: No difference. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used it as directed and did not see any results. And you will feel on fire. Could hardly stand it. All that pain and no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: My go-to! Amazing smell, great results
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite and go-to! Even if I only imagine it, I feel like my skin really got tighter and softer using this. I am using it 2 times a week and make sure to leave my skin uncovered for a while. I personally massage it into my skin. I love the smell and the texture. It is kind of oily but not too oily, you can easily wash it off. All in all I would recommend this product 100%
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from this oil. I have terrible cellulite. I've tried surgery, endermology every cream. I just wanted a good smelling oil for my dry skin. This absorbs fantastic into my skin. It has improved my cellulite in two days. I use it on my son's dry skin as well. It smells so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied results, especially paired with exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product when I was on the Keto diet and exercising. I saw a more dramatic result losing inches around my stomach using this along with keto, than my sister who did not use this product but was also on the keto diet & exercising as well. I bought this again because I’m off the keto diet and have gained 10 lbs back. I use it every morning after I shower and so far I have noticed my stomach starting to slim down. I’m sure with exercise, I would see more results as I did the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Darci Xiong

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for a couple of months. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple of months. It is very moisturizing and the scent is fresh. It advertises itself as an Anti Cellulite treatment, but I have not noticed a decrease in my cellulite. I actually don't have much cellulose but was hoping to reduce the appearance of what I do have on my inner thighs, and after using this for two months as directed, I have not seen a decrease.
customer_reviews.author: MLeo

customer_reviews.title: It takes a while to show result.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the oil in my belly almost every day in the morning. First I moisten the skin with water, I pass the oil and massage the belly so the oil penetrate the skin, then I wrap the belly with saran wrap to not dirty the clothes and spend the day with it. It is still too early to tell if it ends with cellulite or not, but with daily massage, saran wrap around the belly, doing exercises.and eating less certainly helps to improve the appearance of the belly. I'm trying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and smooth, give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: Giving this product 5 Stars for now. I just received it today and used it for the first time. I paired it with anti cellulite cups. It smells amazing. I love anything citrus and it has a nice orange scent. It didn’t leave me too oily and it didn’t create a slip & slide in my shower. It arrived sealed up with 2 pump lids as well as a lid you can pop open. I will update my review in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Loved that it came individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today! I loved that they sent it in bags in case of leakage and that they have pumps. I also bought it as a set to try. I'm very excited and I'll update this when I try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Scented Oil
customer_reviews.text: I felt the scent was overpowering. It is no different really to any other oil, you need to allow time for it to dry before you can dress. After reading all the reviews I was generally disappointed after not seeing any improvement in two weeks. I might as well massage any old cold pressed oil into my skin for a quarter of the price.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Ok I know that when it comes to cellulite miracles don’t exist but when I saw this product and all the reviews I thought maybe it is true so I give this a try. Sadly I was Right it didn’t work for me at all, has a beautiful smell and my skin feels nice after used it but didn’t work for cellulite at all .
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Don’t know if it works yet!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if this really works, but it seems to...could be wishful thinking on my part, but it smells good and is moisturizing so I’ll continue to use it and hope for the best! Make sure your skin is damp, not wet from the shower. Towel off, then apply. A little goes a long way. I loved the fact that it came with a pump and a snap top.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for baritic patients or those with loose skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am a Big girl and this covers me from head to toe once a week, since October and I still have about 1/3rd of a bottle left! I have lost 140lbs ove the last year and I feel this, water, and exercise have helped my skin hold up great! I highly recommend for those that had weight loss surgery or are losing weight quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Katshia

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels great  but not so sure it works for cellulites.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few weeks now. I love the smell and it makes my skin feels smooth. As far as working on cellulite, I don't see any results and I'm not so sure or convinced about it working on cellulites. I'm just addicted to the smell and how my skin feels. This product is also a mixture of oils which can probably be made at home. I'll think about ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: Update:: I absolutely love this oil. It makes your skin so soft and nice. It's works great with helping reduce cellulite. I will be buying this product again. I highly recommend this product. You will definitely see a difference in your skin. I use it twice a day after I shower. I'm glad I tried this product. I am in love with it. I love this oil. I have been using it for about a week and I can already see a little improvement and my skin feels very soft. I can't wait to see future results. I highly recommend this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: But it if you like smelling like cooking oil, cause thats how it starts to smell after it’s on your skin. Didn’t notice a difference. Not a fan. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 4 months and it works great. I have worked in a Spa, used many creams and I think this one has worked the best. Visibly noticable results. I use everyday, sometimes twice a day in the shower. You must massage it in thoroughly. I do notice if you stop using it the results fade quick. I had the flu and wasn't keeping up on it as much and I could tell the difference. Overall great results and love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems to work
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to buy a lot of these, I thought I'd try one since I've lost some weight and now have this weird skin/cellulite thing going on with my legs and belly mostly... it's ok, nothing "wow" - smells very citrusy and it feels good on my skin,.. I can see a bit of a change after just a few uses, but again, nothing "wow" - I'll use it up and go back to my lotion for 1/2 the price
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil so far. It smells really good, citrusy like others have stated. It's not greasy and not watery so it's a good consistency. I also like the way my skin absorbs it. I've only used it for a few days so I can't speak on the the product working exactly but so far so good. No complaints here. I will update in a month or so to share if I noticed any progress with firming or cellulite reduction.
customer_reviews.author: NaturallySassy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 3 months. Yes it smells good and yes it feels great on my skin but I haven't noticed any tightening. And I've used this with the cups and brushes. But no results
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Botello

customer_reviews.title: Finally no more re applying lotion all day long!
customer_reviews.text: I have super dry skin especially right out of the shower! This product saved me from having to moisturize all day long! I just apply a small amount to my skin (not face) right out of shower and I’m good! Make sure skin is still damp so the oil can be absorbed. It absorbs quick no tacky feeling after just soft hydrated skin!
customer_reviews.author: lisa marie 🌸

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this oil for about 3 months. It has helped with my cellulite, but I’ve used it in combination with dry brushing, exercise and lean diet. I don’t believe using it alone would make a difference. I do recommend dry brushing during the day and apply the oil after shower on wet skin. I am almost out of this bottle now after using it almost 3 months and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pats1106

customer_reviews.title: Love this essential oil my favorite works good on skin..no burning sting ..
customer_reviews.text: Best essential oil ...works well with the pink plastic cellulite brush u buy separate unless u see a kit with them together..I did buy the set kit ..bag with brush suction cups silicon u might check this out too on Amazon..best products thanks 💖
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  work
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for like 6 months and it does nothing.. lol.. but i guess my skin is moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to be this bad
customer_reviews.text: It felt nice and tingly when I first started to use it. Then it was just uncomfortable and slimy. My skin didn't really absorb it. I also didn't notice any cellulite difference even when using it with the fascia blaster. Might as well save money and use coconut oil
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Top ingredients. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love The ingredients. Love the way this smells and feels. I need to use more faithfully and I would see the results I'm going for. I already can see the improvement thus far. Plan To reorder and update you all as to progress in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nanc

customer_reviews.title: The cellulite is pretty much completely gone and I am so pleased with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible product!! I've been using it consistently for 3 weeks (combined with exercise) and my skin is noticeably firmer. The cellulite is pretty much completely gone and I am so pleased with how my skin looks. It's super moisturizing, absorbs easily and smells great. Definitely recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a little extra help with cellulite!
customer_reviews.author: Alison M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Oil Blend
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing blend of oils! This product smells AMAZING, perfect scent for massage oil. It seeps into the skin perfectly and moisturizes. I have not tried it long enough to see how it works with cellulite but I'll update when I do. So far I feel it gives my skin an even toner coat, where skin looks vibrant and healthy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kal;fj

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, light orange smell, perfect oil that absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.text: My facialist uses an oil that smells just like this to massage one's face, so I may be biased on this one. I love this oil and have purchased it twice. Good for all uses and absorbs quickly. The pump top comes with a small piece to use when traveling to prevent inadvertent spills/pumps and an extra pump in case the first one breaks. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: LFY

customer_reviews.title: This stuff stinks
customer_reviews.text: Smells good upon application, however, any clothing or fabric that comes into contact with this oil absolutely reeks of rancid oil after laundering. I thought something was wrong with my washer or dryer as entire loads would come out smelling like cooking oil gone bad. Come to find some other reviewers had the same complaint about this product. I've washed these clothes multiple times over the last few weeks and they still reek. So aggravated because of this oil. Ruined my clothes!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I gave it a 2 star because It smells nice and thought it was working but my body couldn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: ALLERGIC REACTION! I was liking this product but after a few days my hands started to itch from applying without gloves. Next day I had hives on my legs which spread throughout my whole body, and I ended up having swelling in face. Benadryl didn’t work, I had to get steroids and take Zyrtec for the continuous hives. I gave it a 2 star because It smells nice and thought it was working but my body couldn’t handle it. If you tend to get allergies I’d stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff!! I've been using it for almost 3 weeks. I wish I should have taken before pictures. I was hesitant about the product at first , but my daughter said WTH Mom!!! How , what?!! They couldnt believe the results. Short shorts for me now. Lol Will spread the love and tell my friends and family about this miracle product.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Shuey

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a week or so and I'm not sure if it truly helps with cellulite yet. What I do know is that it's kinda stinky when you apply it but somehow dries on your skin smelling citrusy. It's FEELS GOOD to apply it and massage it in. Not like icy/hot or tingly just relaxing. It also leaves my skin extremely soft. I really really like this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stackpole

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Experience
customer_reviews.text: Smells lovely and makes my skin smooth and moisturized. I think I see a slight improvement in skin dimpling but will have to use longer to really see if it works. Really a pleasure to use. Do rub it in well and apply to damp skin. Good to use with silicone cups for cellulite.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: After pregnancy I've had some stretch marks and cellulite on ...
customer_reviews.text: After pregnancy I've had some stretch marks and cellulite on my butt , I bought this in hopes for getting ready for vacation and have been using this for a week . My skin feels tighter and less cellulite already ! This stuff really works well for me and I can't wait to see more results right before vacation .
customer_reviews.author: marina kurgansky

customer_reviews.title: Give good result
customer_reviews.text: We need this product for my mom. That’s why I Ordered this product also it had great reviews. Truly my mom is loving this oil. I very recommend it. My mom had a couple of breakouts on her face and this product cleared it up within just two days.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ REVIEW

customer_reviews.title: It really improves cellulitis condition
customer_reviews.text: Citric Scent is marvelous. Leaves skin moisturized. Does not feel sticky or greasy. I got better results using it 30 min before I work out. After work out , I Like to massage my legs and tummy for 10 mins. It improved a lot my cellulitis condition but drinking a lot of water and consistency is the key.
customer_reviews.author: NilG

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the smell..citrus. Did make my skin feel soft but the bottle is too small for having to use it daily and see results. Also the pump they sent with the bottle didn't really fit ..the straw part was way too long. I cut it but it was just annoying to have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Sta

customer_reviews.title: Pump didn't work but . . .
customer_reviews.text: I need to allow time for this to work. In the meantime, when I first used it, I could not get the bottle insert to pop out. Although I would be pumping it into my hand to apply, it seems a bit messy when I have to turn the bottle upside down to get the oil out. With the pump, it might be the same but I don't like dripping oil onto my bathroom rugs. I will keep using it though in case it actually improves my cellulite.
customer_reviews.author: eusrIMHO

customer_reviews.title: Trying to target my loosens skin and cellulite
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this product based on the reviews. I can’t rate five stars yet because to the date I’ve zero improvements in my skin . I use it right after shower in the morning and in the evening.yes .the smells is great and I do like the pump option. I will give a another try . But this time I will use my silicone cupping set. to see if that’s work with anti cellulite massage oil .i will change my rating once I use the second Bottle that I will purchase again .and see the results.im hoping to give you a five star rating as others have ..
customer_reviews.author: Nim from jacksonville

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF. Works really well so far
customer_reviews.text: THIS STUFF IS AMAZING. After 4 Days I already see a difference and the smell is very light. I wish i took a day 1 picture to really show how well it's worked for me so far. IF your'e on the fence. GET IT. You can always return it but you won't want too.
customer_reviews.author: KayOh

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good. Using this post partum to regain tummy tone. I think it is helping but will continue to use either way because of the natural oils and delicious fragrance. I even bought it for my expecting cousin as part of her baby gift
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: The product made my skin soft and has a nice smell. I didn’t notice it made any difference to cellulite on my skin and it takes a while to rub into your skin. Can very easily ruin clothes if not rubbed in all the way. Probably won’t buy again as it doesnt do what it claims to do in the description.
customer_reviews.author: lu1975

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: This actually does diminish the APPEARANCE of cellulite. I emphasize appearance because the day after using it, I notice little tiny stretch marks where it has plumped the skin enough to lessen the appearance of cellulite. However, once the plumpness has lessened you're left with the little stretch marks until you use it again. Whether it actually reduces cellulite over time is hard to tell at this point (2 weeks in).
customer_reviews.author: Wnda009

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this oil would actually do what it promises, but a friend recommended it, so I tried it. I absolutely noticed a difference in the reduction of cellulite on my stomach. I use it almost every day in the shower, with an anti-cellulite cup to massage it in. It took a couple of months, but the cellulite is 90% gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Def recommend using this product while the skin is still damp
customer_reviews.text: Def recommend using this product while the skin is still damp. The oil will absorb into the skin and leave your skin looking hydrated and replenished. I used this product every day for about 10 day and started to notice a difference. If you use this product on dry skin the oil does not absorb and leaves your skin very oily for quite some time
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very bad smell, hard to use because of it.
customer_reviews.text: It smells bad. I used it for about a month and not much improvement on cellulites. Will not be purchasing again. If it had a more pleasant smell, I probably would buy again because I love body oils. But the smell is overpowering petroleum like smell, like gasoline. It's hard to use because of the smell. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe28

customer_reviews.title: 18 days...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this with 2 other products that were shown when I was going to buy it... I’ve only been using it for 18days... and this is with eating slightly right and little exercise, and using it twice a day... I just had my 5 child and it helped me get rid of the extra fat I got while pregnant, since it was harder this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: on my second bottle
customer_reviews.text: I put this on and use my electric cellulite massager. Massager also sold on amazon. For me and others who cannot rub in a anti cellulite with the hands tiring use the massager. This product smells good and feels great on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: MOS

customer_reviews.title: The scent is citrusy and divine!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this massage oil! I personally use it with the facial cupping set that I purchased. It last for a long time, smells amazing and does not leave my skin greasy/oily feeling.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Vassar

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Had this oil for about 2 weeks and with the dry brushing and consistent use, I can see results! I dry brush in and out of the shower daily. Consistency,discipline, and the right diet along with exercise is the key!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great for soft skin. Not sure about cellulite.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it 4 stars because I like the smell and the way it makes my skin feel. I’ll probably by another bottle for that reason only. It makes my skin really soft, but hasn’t made any difference in my cellulite as far as I can tell. Even with the cellulite massage tool that I use it with directly out of the shower or bath. Maybe I’ll get lucky with bottle number 2?
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Not greasy, not sticky, great smell.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. The smell is pleasant. I use it with my cellulite brush and its works wonders to help glide that on my skin. in addition, I use this for cupping and massages. It's not sticky or greasy, and does absorb in the skin to an extent. I have bought this a couple times now.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Small size but smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know if it helps with cellulite but the ingredients are clean and the orange citrus scent is something I didn't know I needed (it's amazing). My only issues is that if you're looking to use this on your whole body (what I did) it won't last long. But I will buy it again !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great massage oil
customer_reviews.text: Getting rid of cellulite is no easy fix. I massage my girlfreind often with this product for long periods of time. We both love the citrus scent. It warms the skin during massage. Dont use it for hanky panky with her. But it's a great massage oil to love each others body with. I use it everywhere except her one lady part. It is amazing. Feeling and light and clean. It doesnt stick to sheets or leave you feeling yucky. I have noticed her skin getting smooth and silky. The cellulite still shows upon standing but laying down. It looks very toned. I'm going to order bottle 3 now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allen Beitscher

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Its slightly warming - so just be aware of that. but it makes for a great massage oil for legs, lower back and around those celluliety spots. I really like it - also it smells a bit citrusy and very fresh and pleasant
customer_reviews.author: M Luongo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Oil, But I Can't Call It Anti-Cellulite
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for treatments that help reduce the appearance of cellulite. I have been rather stubborn, but have finally come to the conclusion that, for some of us, these treatments do not exist. I'm genetically prone to cellulite and no matter how much I work out, watch my weight or use treatments, it doesn't make much of a dent (pun intended). I'm sorry to say this oil was no different. I have been using it for almost two months and have followed the directions carefully. I have seen no difference in the appearance of cellulite. The smell is OK and it is a nice oil, but I would probably not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant scent, Not sticky
customer_reviews.text: It has a very pleasant scent to it. I use it for blasting. It works great for that. I can also rub it in my skin when I'm done... As far as helping to diminish the cellulite on its own. I'm not sure how it would work without using my blaster. But I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Elagriff

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Asborb
customer_reviews.text: When I apply this oil on to my skin, it does not absorb at all. It stays oily for a great amount of time. I usually applied this after shower and it doesn't help. As to the cellulite, I don't see any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for about 2 weeks now and I can see a difference already. The smell is great and makes my skin feel smooth. I purchased it along with a massager and I apply it after showering every night. it absorbs into my skin perfectly. I also like the fact that it washes off easily with soap and water and doesn’t leave my hands super oily. Can’t wait to see the results in a few more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: lizette mercado

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth citrus scented oil
customer_reviews.text: I would like to take this time to actually acknowledge the owner of this company & say that she is very professional.i had a minor problem with the smell of the oil & she got back to me very courteously. The product itself is very very silky and smooth,but for me the smell is too strong. If you like citrus/lemon then you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: jazmyne Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Looks Bigger Than What It Is
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sales tactic, the bottle is smaller than what the pictures represent. The texture is nice, but I will not be applying it in my bathtub, I do not want the oil to stain it. Let’s see the results.
customer_reviews.author: Mari M

customer_reviews.title: Third Time User
customer_reviews.text: I’ve orders this product 3 times. 1st in 2017 - the bottle was larger and the scent pleasant. Second time bottle was same size but the scent was completely different. Each time product worked as expecteded. I just ordered it a few days ago, for the third time. The fluid oz. is the same on label but bottle is way smaller and scent is less pleasant. Hoping it still produces the same results but am skeptical. Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to moisturize my skin after the shower, so I’m not sure about the anti-cellulite cababilities. My skin feels super soft after using this oil, and the light citrus scent smells amazing! This is now my favorite oil to put on after I shower, it’s that good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi W

customer_reviews.title: Great Oil !
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this oil. I use it with my blaster for my thighs everyday and for my stomach as well. It does not absorb quickly so I use it at night before bed time. It smells fresh like a lemon citrus smell. Good size bottle it will last you a while !
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it... it do not work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this crap!!! It do not work... a load of crap for sure!!! Waste of money and time... very oily and it don’t remove anything ... I used it daily with no results ... not worth it unless u wanna be oily for awhile
customer_reviews.author: Aretha blue

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this works, can't use it. It smells way too strong
customer_reviews.author: Gifter

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works. I use it with the cups and ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works. I use it with the cups and it helps smooth the skin out so much! Smells a little weird, but I kinda don’t mind it. Really greasy and thin, make sure you do it in the tub or lay a towel down. And make sure you clean it up after out of the tub. VERY slippery if you don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Roose

customer_reviews.title: ... every shower with my Minalo body brush and absolutely love it! Since using it
customer_reviews.text: I use this after every shower with my Minalo body brush and absolutely love it! Since using it, I have noticed my skin is softer and more toned. It has also help to diminish the appearance of stretch marks in my stomach. The smell is great and it absorbs into your skin fast so it doesn't get on your clothes. I don't have a lot of cellulite so I'm unable to comment on this. What I can say is that this definitely improves the overall appearance of your skin making it younger looking and give you a natural glow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: New York Biology Anti Cellulite Treatment Massage Oil - All Natural Ingredients – Infused with Essential Oils - Penetrates Skin and Targets Unwanted Fat Tissues - 8 oz
feature_bullets: ANTI CELLULITE OIL helps break down fat cells in those problem areas such as hips, thighs, buttocks and abdomen. Unlike cellulite cream it absorbs into the skin immediately and attacks those unwanted fat tissues.
FIRMS, SMOOTHES, TONES SKIN with powerful ingredients this oil penetrates the skin more effectively than cellulite cream and fights excessive body fat which help get rid of cellulite at every level.

ALL NATURAL INGREDIENTS such as Grape Seed Oil, Eucalyptus, Citrus Lemon and Grapefruit work in concert to tackle unwanted fat tissues. Each component used in this cellulite oil play a key role to help the firming and tightening process.

BEST CELLULITE TREATMENT this aromatic oil helps eliminate toxins and deliver and overall feeling of wellbeing. Combined with essential oils and other plant extracts it balances and nourishes the skin surface for a more radiant and healthier looking skin.
PRODUCT OF THE USA our natural cellulite remover oil is made using the Highest Quality Ingredients. It does not contain alcohol, parabens or sulfates and is not tested on animals.

specifications.Manufacturer: NEW YORK BIOLOGY THE ULTIMATE COSMECEUTICALS
